__e: But like everything on this island, it hasn't functioned in years.
I don't know what you're... Nothing happens on this island without me hearing about it.
I spent a year on this island. You never told me there was a bar.
Whatever it is, it'll get you off this island, and you can start your life again.
Thirty-five years I lived on this island. And all I ever heard was your name, over and over.
I understand why you need this island. I understand it all because I was there the day our lives ended and all of this began.
